Package com.sucy.skill.api.util

Class ParticleHelper

java.lang.Object
com.sucy.skill.api.util.ParticleHelper
public class ParticleHelper extends Object
Helper class for playing particles via config strings in various ways.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    AMOUNT_KEY
    Settings key for the amount of particles to play
    static final String
    ARRANGEMENT_KEY
    Settings key for the arrangement type of particles
    static final String
    DATA_KEY
    Settings key for the Bukkit effects' data (default 0)
    static final String
    DIRECTION_KEY
    Settings key for the particle arrangement direction (circles only)
    static final String
    DX_KEY
    Settings key for the reflection particles' X-offset (default 0)
    static final String
    DY_KEY
    Settings key for the reflection particles' Y-offset (default 0)
    static final String
    DZ_KEY
    Settings key for the reflection particles' Z-offset (default 0)
    static final String
    LEVEL
    The level to use for scaling values
    static final String
    MATERIAL_KEY
    Settings key for the material used by the particle (for block crack, icon crack, and block dust)
    static final String
    PARTICLE_KEY
    Settings key for the type of particle
    static final String
    PARTICLES_KEY
    Number of particles
    static final String
    RADIUS_KEY
    Settings key for the radius of the particle arrangement
    static final String
    SPEED_KEY
    Settings key for the reflection particles' "speed" value (default 1)
    static final String
    TYPE_KEY
    Settings key for the material data used by the particle (for block crack, icon crack, and block dust)
    static final String
    VISIBLE_RADIUS_KEY
    Settings key for the reflection particles' visible radius (default 25)

    • play

      public static void play(org.bukkit.Location loc, org.bukkit.EntityEffect effect)
      Plays an entity effect at the given location
      Parameters:
      loc - location to play the effect
      effect - entity effect to play

    • play

      public static void play(org.bukkit.Location loc, Settings settings)
      Plays particles about the given location using the given settings
      Parameters:
      loc - location to center the effect around
      settings - data to play the particles with

    • play

      public static void play(org.bukkit.Location loc, String particle, Settings settings)
      Plays a particle at the given location based on the string
      Parameters:
      loc - location to play the effect
      particle - particle to play
      settings - data to play the particle with

    • fillCircle

      public static void fillCircle(org.bukkit.Location loc, String particle, Settings settings, double radius, int amount, Direction direction)
      Plays several of a particle type randomly within a circle
      Parameters:
      loc - center location of the circle
      particle - particle to play
      settings - data to play the particle with
      radius - radius of the circle
      amount - amount of particles to play

    • fillSphere

      public static void fillSphere(org.bukkit.Location loc, String particle, Settings settings, double radius, int amount)
      Randomly plays particle effects within the sphere
      Parameters:
      loc - location to center the effect around
      particle - the string value for the particle
      settings - data to play the particle with
      radius - radius of the sphere
      amount - amount of particles to use

    • fillHemisphere

      public static void fillHemisphere(org.bukkit.Location loc, String particle, Settings settings, double radius, int amount)
      Randomly plays particle effects within the hemisphere
      Parameters:
      loc - location to center the effect around
      particle - the string value for the particle
      settings - data to play the particle with
      radius - radius of the sphere
      amount - amount of particles to use
